model.name: method
model.title: Bean method
model.description: For expressions and predicates using a java bean (aka method call)
model.label: language

bean.description: Either a reference or a class name of the bean to use

ref.description: Reference to bean to lookup in the registry

beanType.description: Class name of the bean to use

expression.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

trim.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

id.description: Sets the id of this node
